plugins.name: Fastr Exporter
plugins.description:
This plugin can convert a Figma file into a Fastr compatible format. This will generate a .zip file that you can import into Fastr Frontend platform. One quick import is all it takes to transform your Figma files into fully interactive experiences—brand components, fonts, and layouts intact. Get ready to edit, animate, and publish designs faster than ever before.


How to use the plug-in

If you have any issues when using the plugin, we recommend visiting our community article, which has a full guide and FAQs. For more information about the Fastr Frontend platform, please visit our website.


Reporting Issues

For any questions, please email support@getfastr.com and our team can assist further


License


This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.

Copyright (c) KALEIDOS INC

The Fastr Exporter was built using the Penpot Exporter.

Penpot and the Penpot exporter plugin are Kaleidos’ open source projects.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly Bring Your Figma Designs into Fastr Frontend

plugins.name: Reorder Nested Instances Tool
plugins.description:
Reorder Nested Instances lets you reorder nested instances inside any Figma component instance. No detaching.


To undo a reorder, you can:

* Select the canvas and use 'Undo' (Cmd+Z / Ctrl+Z).

* Restore your file using Version History (before the plugin was applied).


Note: Support for persisting style overrides is actively being worked on - Please support this plugins development by providing feedback on the form found here.
plugins.tagline: Reorder nested instances with ease!

137207.name: Reorder Nested Instances Tool
137207.description:
Reorder Nested Instances lets you reorder nested instances inside any Figma component instance. No detaching.

Note: Support for persisting style overrides is actively being worked on - Please support this plugins development by providing feedback on the form found here.
137207.release_notes: Added nested instance previews and sync button.

plugins.name: Font Classifier
plugins.description:
Font Classifier helps designers sort fonts into custom categories like Serif, Display, Branding, and more.

Quickly preview and apply fonts to selected text layers in Figma without digging through the full font list.

No more scrolling through 1000+ alphabetically listed fonts — just categorize your favorites and access them instantly.

Ideal for web, UI, and graphic designers who want faster access to curated typefaces.

Save time, stay consistent, and build your own font system directly in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Organize, preview, and apply fonts by category — faster typography for designers.

137007.name: Font Classifier
137007.description:
Font Classifier helps designers sort fonts into custom categories like Serif, Display, Branding, and more.

Quickly preview and apply fonts to selected text layers in Figma without digging through the full font list.

No more scrolling through 1000+ alphabetically listed fonts — just categorize your favorites and access them instantly.

Ideal for web, UI, and graphic designers who want faster access to curated typefaces.

Save time, stay consistent, and build your own font system directly in Figma.
137007.tagline: Organize, preview, and apply fonts by category — faster typography for designers.

plugins.name: Wave Design Token Exporter
plugins.description:
The Design Token Exporter plugin allows designers and developers to easily export Figma's local styles and variables into a clean, structured JSON format.


Export color, text, and effect styles


Export all variable collections and modes


Choose between "Variables" or "Styles" before exporting


Copy JSON or download it for use in your design system


Perfect for integrating with codebases using tokens in Tailwind, Style Dictionary, or design systems

accepted.name: Open Wave.io
accepted.description: Open Wave is an open-source organization Founded by Lawrence Okosa III. creating tools that streamline design and development workflows.

plugins.tagline: Export Figma styles and variables as design tokens in JSON format.

137171.name: Wave Design Token Exporter
137171.description:
The Design Token Exporter plugin allows designers and developers to easily export Figma's local styles and variables into a clean, structured JSON format.


Export color, text, and effect styles


Export all variable collections and modes


Choose between "Variables" or "Styles" before exporting


Copy JSON or download it for use in your design system


Perfect for integrating with codebases using tokens in Tailwind, Style Dictionary, or design systems

137171.tagline: Export Figma styles and variables as design tokens in JSON format.

plugins.name: UX Buddy
plugins.description:
Transform your design process with instant, expert-level UX feedback.


UX Buddy is your personal design critic that never sleeps. This powerful Figma plugin analyzes your frames and provides instant, actionable feedback based on proven UX principles and industry best practices.


What UX Buddy Does:

✨ **Instant UX Analysis** - Get comprehensive design feedback in seconds, not hours

🎯 **Actionable Insights** - Receive specific, implementable recommendations to improve your designs

🎨 **Visual Design Review** - Analyze color usage, typography, spacing, and visual hierarchy

📱 **Accessibility Checks** - Ensure your designs meet accessibility standards and guidelines

🚀 **Workflow Integration** - Seamlessly integrates into your existing Figma workflow


Key Features:

- **Smart Color Analysis** - Detect contrast issues and color harmony problems

- **Typography Review** - Identify font pairing, hierarchy, and readability issues

- **Layout Evaluation** - Analyze spacing, alignment, and visual balance

- **UX Best Practices** - Get feedback based on established design principles

- **Detailed Reports** - Receive comprehensive analysis with prioritized recommendations

- **Real-time Feedback** - Instant analysis as you design


Perfect For:

- **Product Designers** looking to validate their design decisions

- **UX/UI Designers** wanting to ensure best practices

- **Design Teams** seeking consistent quality standards

- **Freelancers** who need expert-level feedback

- **Students** learning design principles


How It Works:

1. Select any frame in your Figma file

2. Click the UX Buddy plugin

3. Get instant, expert-level analysis

4. Implement suggested improvements

5. Create better user experiences


**Professional-grade analysis** - Providing comprehensive design critique and UX insights based on industry standards and proven methodologies.


Stop guessing about your design decisions. Let UX Buddy guide you toward creating exceptional user experiences that delight and convert.

accepted.name: Opeyemi Ajagbe
accepted.description: I craft digital products that empower people and drive business growth.

plugins.tagline: Expert UX analysis that makes your designs better, instantly.

137629.name: UX Buddy
137629.description:
Transform your design process with instant, expert-level UX feedback.


UX Buddy is your personal design critic that never sleeps. This powerful Figma plugin analyzes your frames and provides instant, actionable feedback based on proven UX principles and industry best practices.


What UX Buddy Does:

✨ **Instant UX Analysis** - Get comprehensive design feedback in seconds, not hours

🎯 **Actionable Insights** - Receive specific, implementable recommendations to improve your designs

🎨 **Visual Design Review** - Analyze color usage, typography, spacing, and visual hierarchy

📱 **Accessibility Checks** - Ensure your designs meet accessibility standards and guidelines

🚀 **Workflow Integration** - Seamlessly integrates into your existing Figma workflow


Key Features:

- **Smart Color Analysis** - Detect contrast issues and color harmony problems

- **Typography Review** - Identify font pairing, hierarchy, and readability issues

- **Layout Evaluation** - Analyze spacing, alignment, and visual balance

- **UX Best Practices** - Get feedback based on established design principles

- **Detailed Reports** - Receive comprehensive analysis with prioritized recommendations

- **Real-time Feedback** - Instant analysis as you design


Perfect For:

- **Product Designers** looking to validate their design decisions

- **UX/UI Designers** wanting to ensure best practices

- **Design Teams** seeking consistent quality standards

- **Freelancers** who need expert-level feedback

- **Students** learning design principles


How It Works:

1. Select any frame in your Figma file

2. Click the UX Buddy plugin

3. Get instant, expert-level analysis

4. Implement suggested improvements

5. Create better user experiences


**Professional-grade analysis** - Providing comprehensive design critique and UX insights based on industry standards and proven methodologies.


Stop guessing about your design decisions. Let UX Buddy guide you toward creating exceptional user experiences that delight and convert.
137629.release_notes:
### **Major Update: Context-Aware Progressive Analysis System**

We've completely revolutionized the UX Buddy experience by solving the "moving goalpost" problem that frustrated users. Version 2.0 introduces intelligent analysis that remembers your progress and builds upon your improvements.

---

### ✨ **What's New in Version 2.0**

🧠 **Smart Progress Recognition**
- **Analysis Memory**: UX Buddy now remembers all your previous analyses and improvements
- **Progress Acknowledgment**: Get explicit recognition when you implement recommendations
- **Context-Aware Feedback**: Each new analysis builds upon what you've already fixed
- **No More Repeated Suggestions**: Fixed issues are never suggested again

📈 **Intelligent Score Progression**
- **Realistic Score Evolution**: Scores now properly reflect actual improvements made
- **Progress Validation**: Built-in checks prevent contradictory recommendations
- **Score History Tracking**: See how your design quality improves over time
- **Polish Mode**: Special high-quality design analysis for scores 7.0+

💎 **Enhanced Analysis Quality**
- **Semantic Issue Matching**: Advanced AI determines if issues are truly fixed or similar
- **Conflict Detection**: Prevents suggestions that would undo previous improvements
- **Progressive Recommendations**: New suggestions only when genuinely critical
- **Quality Validation**: Automatic checks ensure every analysis meets high standards
137629.tagline: Expert UX analysis that makes your designs better, instantly.

plugins.name: Text Extractor
plugins.description:
Plugin Features


Extract Text from Selected Figma Frames

Seamlessly extract text from any selected frames in your Figma project. This feature allows you to quickly gather all text elements for further processing or analysis.


Automatically Generate Variable Names

Automatically convert extracted text into variable names using camelCase format. This feature supports English text only, ensuring consistent and clean variable naming for your projects.


Create Custom Delimiter Sets

Design your own delimiter sets to wrap text with brackets, quotes, or any custom markers. Use intuitive keyboard shortcuts to apply these delimiters, enhancing your workflow for variable processing and other text transformation tasks.


Easily Copy and Paste

Effortlessly copy the extracted text and variable names to paste into Google Sheets or other tools.
plugins.tagline: Extract text from frames and auto-generate variable names

137978.name: Text Extractor
137978.description:
Plugin Features


Extract Text from Selected Figma Frames

Seamlessly extract text from any selected frames in your Figma project. This feature allows you to quickly gather all text elements for further processing or analysis.


Automatically Generate Variable Names

Automatically convert extracted text into variable names using camelCase format. This feature supports English text only, ensuring consistent and clean variable naming for your projects.


Create Custom Delimiter Sets

Design your own delimiter sets to wrap text with brackets, quotes, or any custom markers. Use intuitive keyboard shortcuts to apply these delimiters, enhancing your workflow for variable processing and other text transformation tasks.


Easily Copy and Paste

Effortlessly copy the extracted text and variable names to paste into Google Sheets or other tools.
137978.release_notes:
• Fresh new UI with collapsible sections and modern design
• Improved keyboard navigation and focus management
• Updated plugin icon and preview images
137978.tagline: Extract text from frames and auto-generate variable names

plugins.name: Awesome Bulk Metadata Importer
plugins.description:
Have you ever tried to add extra documentation to your Figma components, looking or better parity with your code or docs site? With this plugin, you can better utilize the Assets menu by searching components or icons by description or keywords.


This plugin checks a JSON file, and updates the alt text/description, synonym keywords, and link for all components and variants. Run this 1x for your entire library and stop wasting time manually updating metadata!


Sample CSV and JSON template
plugins.tagline: Bulk update your component descriptions, keywords, and docs link

plugins.name: Content Magic Filler with OpenAI
plugins.description:
1. Select one or more layers in your Figma file (the plugin will find all text layers within your selection).
  2. Open the plugin and enter your OpenAI API key. If you don't have one: https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936850-where-do-i-find-my-openai-api-key
  3. Type a prompt or instruction describing the kind of text you want (e.g., “US zip code”, “company name”, “city in Japan”).
  4. Click "Generate Text". Each selected text layer will be filled with a unique, AI-generated response matching your instruction.
plugins.tagline: Instantly fill your Figma text layers with smart, unique AI-generated content.

135957.name: Content Magic Filler with OpenAI
135957.description:

  3. Type a prompt or instruction describing the kind of text you want (e.g., “US zip code”, “company name”, “city in Japan”).
  4. Click "Generate Text". Each selected text layer will be filled with a unique, AI-generated response matching your instruction.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin needs to communicate with OpenAI's API to generate AI-powered text content for selected layers in Figma.

135957.tagline: Instantly fill your Figma text layers with smart, unique AI-generated content.

plugins.name: datify
plugins.description:
Quickly update or increment dates across selected frames or text layers. It's perfect for tables, planners, and any layout where dates need to be updated regularly.


  1. Set a start date and automatically increment dates within each frame or across multiple frames
  2. Auto-detect the existing date values across selected frames
  3. Retain the original date format or choose from a list of supported formats
  4. Skip hidden layers
  5. Choose whether to increment dates continuously across all selected frames or restart within each frame
  6. Set the increment to 0 to update all date values to the same date
  7. Enter a minus sign (–) before the number to decrement the dates instead.


📅 Supported date formats:

  1. MMM D (Jan 31)
  2. D MMM YYYY (31 Jan 2025)
  3. D MMMM YYYY (31 January 2025)
  4. MMMM D, YYYY (January 31, 2025)
  5. YYYY-MM-DD (2025-01-31)
  6. DD/MM/YYYY (31/01/2025)
  7. DD-MM-YYYY (31-01-2025)
  8. D/M/YYYY (5/6/2025)
  9. M/D/YY (1/31/25)
  10. YYYY/MM/DD (2025/01/31)
  11. MMMM YYYY (January 2025)
  12. D MMM YY (31 Jan 25)
  13. D.M.YYYY (31.01.2025)
  14. YYYY. M. D (2025. 1. 31)
plugins.tagline: A quick way to update and format dates in your designs

plugins.name: Variables 2 Table
plugins.description:
Variables 2 Table is a Figma plugin that turns all your variables—including numbers, colors, strings, and booleans—into a well-structured table directly on the canvas.

It clearly displays modes, types, and alias relationships, making it perfect for managing complex design systems and supporting design reviews and documentation.
plugins.tagline: Visualize all Figma variables in a structured table format.

135368.description:

plugins.name: Nexus
plugins.description:
Nexus is a Figma plugin designed to seamlessly sync content from Google Sheets while automatically updating text layers and their names.


Built for designers and product teams, Nexus eliminates manual copy-pasting by connecting your Figma files to a centralized content source. Select a language, pick the texts you need, and apply them in one click — layer names and content are updated instantly.


✅ Real-time sync with Google Sheets

✅ Automatic update of text layer content

✅ Structured layer renaming (#BODY.x, #CTA.x)

✅ Clean, intuitive interface for efficient workflows


Save time. Stay consistent. Focus on design.

Nexus handles the repetitive work — you focus on creating.
plugins.tagline: Power Your Workflow

136280.description:

plugins.name: Tokenize Your Design
plugins.description:
Tokenize Your Design helps you bring consistency and scalability to your Figma files by automatically replacing static colors with matching token values from your design system.


✅ Key features:

•Scan your entire design file to detect non-token colors

•Match them with the color tokens from your local design system

•Maintain consistent styling across large-scale designs


Perfect for design system maintainers, developers and teams aiming to scale design efficiently.
plugins.tagline: Bring consistency to your design by mapping colors to design system tokens.

133450.name: Tokenize Your Design
133450.description:
Tokenize Your Design helps you bring consistency and scalability to your Figma files by automatically replacing static colors with matching token values from your design system.


✅ Key features:

•Scan your entire design file to detect non-token colors

•Match them with the color tokens from your local design system

•Maintain consistent styling across large-scale designs


Perfect for design system maintainers, developers and teams aiming to scale design efficiently.

133450.tagline: Bring consistency to your design by mapping colors to design system tokens.

plugins.name: Hotkey
plugins.description:
Hotkey lets you control Figma layouts entirely from your keyboard using simple shortcuts. Quickly move, resize, and adjust constraints without opening any panels. Chain commands for efficient workflows. Designed for speed and minimal distraction. Works on selected layers; some features depend on Figma’s API limits.


Read the Docs here: https://navaneethvenu.notion.site/Hotkey-Plugin-1f4ef6c3905a80349201f06119dfeb04?pvs=4


If you have any further questions or need assistance, join our discord server or our telegram community.
plugins.tagline: Hotkey is a keyboard-first Figma plugin for fast layout control using shortcuts and commands.

135952.name: Hotkey
135952.description:
Hotkey lets you control Figma layouts entirely from your keyboard using simple shortcuts. Quickly move, resize, and adjust constraints without opening any panels. Chain commands for efficient workflows. Designed for speed and minimal distraction. Works on selected layers; some features depend on Figma’s API limits.


Read the Docs here: https://navaneethvenu.notion.site/Hotkey-Plugin-1f4ef6c3905a80349201f06119dfeb04?pvs=4


If you have any further questions or need assistance, join our discord server or our telegram community.
135952.release_notes:
Commands:
1. New Increase/Decrease Width & Height Commands: Use +h, -h, +w, and -w to dynamically adjust height and width values relative to current dimensions.

Other Changes:
1. Added support for + and - prefixes in command parsing (e.g., +h12, -w8) and updated internal regex handling accordingly.
135952.tagline: Hotkey is a keyboard-first Figma plugin for fast layout control using shortcuts and commands.

plugins.name: Lingo
plugins.description:
Lingo helps designers and design teams scale products across multiple markets faster by streamlining localization. Effortlessly translate your designs into multiple languages — we handle conversion so you can focus on adaptation.


How to use:


  1. Open the plugin
  2. Select entire frame/specific section with content to be translated
  3. Select preferred language and translate.


Use cases:


Lingo will be useful for you or you team if you:


  1. Operate in multiple markets – Whether you're launching globally or scaling your existing products across regions, Lingo ensures seamless translation and localization.
  2. Need fast, high-quality translations – Quickly adapt marketing materials, product descriptions, and support docs without sacrificing accuracy.
  3. Work with visual content – Effortlessly translate social media graphics, posters, infographics, ads, and blog visuals while preserving design integrity.
  4. Manage multilingual blogs and articles – Localize blog posts, newsletters, and landing pages while maintaining SEO optimization.
  5. Run international ad campaigns – Adapt ad copy, video subtitles, and CTAs for different audiences with culturally relevant messaging.
  6. Collaborate with global teams – Streamline workflows by enabling real-time translation for internal documents, presentations, and training materials.
  7. Support customer experience (CX) – Provide multilingual customer service content, FAQs, and chatbots for better engagement.


Lingo helps you break language barriers efficiently, so you can focus on adaptation and growth, not conversion.


We'd love to hear from you!❤️

How are you using Lingo? What’s working well, and what could be even better? Your feedback helps us improve and serve you best—so don’t hesitate to share your thoughts, wishes, or even tiny frustrations.


Drop us a note at ajaoabdulsamad2000@gmail.com.

accepted.name: Kolade
accepted.description: Product designer - Impacting lives and businesses through elegant and delightful digital experiences

plugins.tagline: Reach every market!

How are you using Lingo? What’s working well, and what could be even better? Your feedback helps us improve and serve you best—so don’t hesitate to share your thoughts, wishes, or even tiny frustrations.


Drop us a note at ajaoabdulsamad2000@gmail.com.
138072.release_notes:
Integrate translation from other languages to English  
Improved on language auto detection

plugins.name: Replacer
plugins.description:
You select the object / component in figma and run this plugin.

For color groups: It automatically scans for "groups" and will do it's best to replace it with color variables that share the same naming structure.

For color variables, or plain colors: You select the color / variable to be replaced (target) and select the color to replace it with (source).

Done.

☑ Panel will remember what function you used last time.

☑ Works with gradient stops, colors in text fields and drop/inner shadows.
plugins.tagline: Replaces colors based on their "group" or per link to a color variable.

plugins.name: Round Width to 8
plugins.description:
Make your designs cleaner and more consistent with this simple plugin that rounds the width of selected elements up to the next multiple of 8. Great for enforcing 8px spacing systems, aligning to design tokens, or preparing components for dev handoff.


Just select one or more resizable elements and run the plugin — no UI, no fuss.
plugins.tagline: Rounds element widths up to the next multiple of 8 — clean, consistent, and dev-ready.

plugins.name: frameToGroup
plugins.description:
frameToGroup converts frames into organised groups while retaining essential visual properties.


✨ Key Features

✅ Effortless Conversion – Convert frames into neatly structured groups while keeping fills, strokes, and effects intact.

✅ Nested Frame Handling – Automatically processes nested frames for a well-organised layer structure.

✅ Style Preservation – Retains local styles and effects using asynchronous processing.

✅ User-Friendly UI – Simple, intuitive interface with one-click conversion.

✅ Continuous Workflow – Keep the plugin open for multiple conversions without interruptions.


✨ How to Use

  1. Select the frames you wish to convert in your Figma document.
  2. Click "Convert Frames to Groups" in the plugin UI.
plugins.tagline: Convert Frames to Groups While Retaining Styles

119879.description:

plugins.name: 画板json导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin is designed to help users export detailed JSON data of selected nodes, including auto layout information, Frame nesting relationships, text properties, and more. With this plugin, users can easily retrieve structured data from design elements, facilitating data analysis, secondary development, or documentation.


功能

  1. Export complete JSON data of selected nodes, including properties like type, name, size, position, fills, strokes, and more.
  2. Support exporting text content, font name, font size, and other properties of text nodes.
  3. Support nested export of nodes such as Frame, Group, Component, and Instance, preserving the full hierarchical structure.
  4. Complete export of auto layout information, including layout mode, primary and secondary axis alignment, padding, and spacing.
  5. Safely serialized JSON data export ensures compatibility and completeness.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select one or more nodes from which you want to export data.
  2. Click the export button in the plugin, and the plugin will automatically extract all relevant information from the selected nodes and generate JSON data.
  3. The exported JSON data will be displayed in the plugin interface, allowing users to copy or download it for further use.


Notes

  1. This plugin currently supports exporting properties of common node types such as Frame.
  2. Ensure that the selected node types are supported by the plugin; otherwise, related data might not be exportable.
  3. If errors occur during the export process, check whether the nodes contain excessive nesting or complex properties. Simplify the structure if needed and try again.


简介

本插件旨在帮助用户导出选定节点的详细 JSON 数据，包括节点的自动布局信息、Frame 嵌套关系、文本属性等。通过此插件，用户可以轻松地获取设计元素的结构化数据，便于进行数据分析、二次开发或文档记录。


功能

  1. 导出选定节点的完整 JSON 数据，包括节点的类型、名称、尺寸、位置、填充、边框等属性。
  2. 支持导出文本节点的文本内容、字体名称、字号等属性。
  3. 支持 Frame、Group、Component、Instance 等节点类型的嵌套导出，保留完整的层次结构。
  4. 自动布局信息的完整导出，包括布局模式、主次轴对齐方式、填充和间距等。
  5. 导出的 JSON 数据经过安全序列化，确保兼容性和完整性。


使用说明

  1. 选中一个或多个需要导出数据的节点。
  2. 在插件中点击导出按钮，插件将自动提取选定节点的所有相关信息并生成 JSON 数据。
  3. 导出的 JSON 数据将会显示在插件界面中，用户可以复制或下载该数据用于其他用途。


注意事项

  1. 本插件目前只支持导出 Frame节点类型的属性。
  2. 请确保选定的节点类型受插件支持，否则可能无法导出相关数据。
  3. 如果导出过程中出现错误，请检查节点是否包含过多层次的嵌套或复杂的属性，建议简化结构后再试。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: The plugin quickly exports selected frame JSON data from Figma for other uses.

plugins.name: WEMS for Figma
plugins.description:
WEMS is a powerful platform that transforms your Figma prototypes into fully functional websites or mobile app view in just a few clicks. Designed for modern creators and product teams, WEMS allows you to:


  1. Convert Figma designs into responsive websites or mobile app view
  2. Optimize pages with built-in SEO tools for website
  3. Add translations for multilingual support
  4. Integrate Lottie and Rive animations
  5. Embed MP4 or other embeddable videos (Youtube, Facebook, Vimeo, Twitch etc.)
  6. Support forms with inputs and data send to endpoint
  7. Integrate payment forms or buttons with own products
  8. Connect a custom domain
  9. Run A/B tests to experiment and improve
  10. Track performance with built-in analytics


With WEMS, you can go from design to deployment in record time — no coding required

plugins.name: FrameFlex - Frame Resizer & Scaler
plugins.description:
🔹 FrameFlex – Smart Frame Resizing for Figma 🎯

Manually resizing frames can be a nightmare — especially when things break.

FrameFlex is a Figma plugin built to help you intelligently scale mobile frames, while preserving structure and layout integrity (when properly set up). ✨


Here’s what FrameFlex can do:


🔁 Multi-frame support – Resize multiple mobile frames in one action.

📱 Device presets – Quickly apply popular mobile screen sizes like iPhone, Android, and more.

📐 Layout-aware resizing – Maintains Auto Layout, constraints, and alignment — if your design is structured correctly.

🔤 Element scaling – Adjusts font size, spacing, strokes, and other properties proportionally.

🎯 Icon/vector protection – Prevents scaling on specific elements to avoid distortion.

⚙️ Rounding controls – Use smart, grid, or exact rounding for clean results.


💡 The more Auto Layout you use, the better the results will be.

FrameFlex works best when your design is clean, consistent, and fully built with Auto Layout in mind.


✅ Focused on mobile-first workflows.

⚠️ Support for other frame types depends on how well they're structured.
plugins.tagline: Resize multiple frames. Preserve structure. Stay consistent.

137642.name: FrameFlex - Frame Resizer & Scaler
137642.description:
🔹 FrameFlex – Smart Frame Resizing for Figma 🎯

Manually resizing frames can be a nightmare — especially when things break.

FrameFlex is a Figma plugin built to help you intelligently scale mobile frames, while preserving structure and layout integrity (when properly set up). ✨


Here’s what FrameFlex can do:


🔁 Multi-frame support – Resize multiple mobile frames in one action.

📱 Device presets – Quickly apply popular mobile screen sizes like iPhone, Android, and more.

📐 Layout-aware resizing – Maintains Auto Layout, constraints, and alignment — if your design is structured correctly.

🔤 Element scaling – Adjusts font size, spacing, strokes, and other properties proportionally.

🎯 Icon/vector protection – Prevents scaling on specific elements to avoid distortion.

⚙️ Rounding controls – Use smart, grid, or exact rounding for clean results.


💡 The more Auto Layout you use, the better the results will be.

FrameFlex works best when your design is clean, consistent, and fully built with Auto Layout in mind.


✅ Focused on mobile-first workflows.

⚠️ Support for other frame types depends on how well they're structured.
137642.tagline: Resize multiple frames. Preserve structure. Stay consistent.

  1. Generate random gradients with an optional noise effect
  2. Paste CSS code from gradientify.app to apply gradients to layers
  3. Use gradients as fill properties for easy customization


Free trial

Try it out up to 5 times in each mode (random generation and CSS import), or unlock unlimited use with a license key.


Thank you for your support

This plugin was built to complement gradientify.app, a free tool for designing and animating gradients for the web. Buying a license helps keep the project going ❤️


Contact me:

If you have questions or comments, please send me a message to rengifo.eder@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Generate and paste CSS gradients to layers as fill properties

137963.name: Gradientify
137963.description:
Bring vibrant, layered gradients into your Figma designs. With this plugin, you can:


  1. Generate random gradients with an optional noise effect
  2. Paste CSS code from gradientify.app to apply gradients to layers
  3. Use gradients as fill properties for easy customization


Free trial

Try it out up to 5 times in each mode (random generation and CSS import), or unlock unlimited use with a license key.


Thank you for your support

This plugin was built to complement gradientify.app, a free tool for designing and animating gradients for the web. Buying a license helps keep the project going ❤️


Contact me:

If you have questions or comments, please send me a message to rengifo.eder@gmail.com

plugins.name: Ai Translate , Edit and Generate Text
plugins.description:
🔤 Ai Translate – Translate, Edit & Generate Text with AI


Ai TranslateAI is your all-in-one AI-powered text assistant inside Figma.


Effortlessly translate, edit, and generate content across your designs — without leaving your canvas. Perfect for designers, product teams, and localization workflows.


✨ Key Features:


🌍 Translate text layers instantly to multiple languages


✏️ Edit existing copy with AI suggestions


🧠 Generate new content powered by artificial intelligence


🗂 Works with selected text, frames, or the whole page


⚡ Fast, intuitive interface designed for creative flow

plugins.name: АвтоГрамоты | AutoGramoty
plugins.description:
Зачем нужен?

Если ты устал заполнять кучу грамот-сертификатов-благодарностей вручную, то этот плагин спасет тебя.

Несколько нажатий вместо нескольких часов


Как пользоваться?

  1. Добавьте маркер в виде текста {{ФИО}} на фрейм
  2. Выделите весь фрейм
  3. Запустите АвтоГрамоты
  4. Введите текст маркера
  5. Введите значения
  6. Нажмите "Создать"


Предложения принимаются в личке


How to use?

  1. Add a marker in the form of text {{KEY} to the frame
  2. Select the entire frame
  3. Launch AutoGramoty
  4. Enter the marker text
  5. Enter the values
  6. Click "Create"
plugins.tagline: Устал делать кучу грамот? Плагин решит твою проблему!
